name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed commands through a scripting interpreter, aiming to exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--4a9ee90e-ac1e-4e84-b0e4-bbc365a2.name: Kill malicious process
action--4a9ee90e-ac1e-4e84-b0e4-bbc365a2.description: Terminate the suspicious script executing on the affected host.

if-condition--2f5e1c57-5f96-43d5-bdc6-ea.name: Check if malicious process is still running

action--2f5e1c57-5f96-43d5-bdc6-ea8870ef.name: Isolate affected host
action--2f5e1c57-5f96-43d5-bdc6-ea8870ef.description: Bring down the affected host to prevent further damage.

action--f376d3bb-a80d-4670-b84e-e46b0f5e.name: Scan for additional threats
action--f376d3bb-a80d-4670-b84e-e46b0f5e.description: Continuously check for additional threats associated with suspicious commands.

commands.command: while [ ! -z "$(ps aux | grep suspicious_command)" ]; do sleep 5; done

loop--threat-scan.name: Scan for threats loop
loop--threat-scan.description: Keep scanning for threats until none are found.

action--update-firewall.name: Update firewall rules
action--update-firewall.description: Block incoming connections from the malicious IP.

action--review-logs.name: Review access logs
action--review-logs.description: Examine logs for any unauthorized access using the specific log file.

log_file.description: The log file containing authentication logs.
